title: OFFSTREAM Men's Party Costume - Tropical Bird Printed Outfit - Yellow, Green
features: TROPICAL GREEN: Looking for fun clothes for men? This green Hawaii suit featuring birds (toucans) and flowers is your go-to outfit for several occasions, like a bachelor party, Halloween, a prom, a summer festival or a Hawaiian theme party. Dress to impress!

CHECK YOUR SIZE: Our suits are outstanding in any situation, so make sure to measure yourself! You don't want to ruin the party with a small suit, do you? Check the measure guide within the images and make sure you receive a size that suits you! The Suit fitting is Slim Fit, so if you are doubting between two sizes, we advise to pick the larger one!

PERFECT FOR ANY OCCASION: Stylish, high-quality suit. Offstream suits are great as a Halloween costume, Outdoor Events, Celebrations, Homecoming and Prom. For when you need to be the best looking at the party.

INCLUDED IN YOUR OUTFIT: All suits have button closure, inside pockets and a modern tailored cut for a stylish fit. The pants have an adjustable waistband.The Offstream men's suits consist out of 100% Polyester & are Machine Washable. The package is including blazer, pants and tie.

ABOUT OFFSTREAM: Show your sense of humor and your sense of style at the same time with an outfit from Offstream. If you're looking for high quality clothing at cool prices you've come to the right place.
description: These funny, colorful suits are your best bet for all kinds of parties. You can impress over and over again in these tropical novelty suits. Dress up for family gatherings and weekend occasions to show your crazy side in a classy way. The trousers and jacket have a slim fit to make you look your best. Pair it with a cool shirt and you'll look like your walking out of an awesome fashion magazine. Happy faces guaranteed!
